================================================================================================
10) Auth and sign-in hazards (likely root cause when specs keep landing back on /signin)
================================================================================================
Context:
  If a layout or wrapper renders a <form> around {children}, the /signin inner form becomes invalid HTML.
  Browsers then submit the outer form (often GET to /signin), causing URLs like /signin?email=...&password=...
  This matches Playwright failures where login never leaves /signin.

========================================================================
A) Layout files that contain a <form> tag
========================================================================

========================================================================
  (none)

========================================================================
